data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xiaosheng, Ren, Shunxiang, Wang, Xingmin (2015): Contribution to the knowledge of the subgenus Scymnus (Parapullus) Yang, 1978 (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae), with description of eight new species. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 62 (2): 211-224, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5285, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5285
